ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: i think it was because in beta nobody ever wanted to play a halfing (no idea why) and so they beefed em up to make them more desirable.
ygData.messageBody:
i think it was because in beta nobody ever wanted to play a halfing (no idea
why) and so they beefed em up to make them more desirable.

At 05:51 PM 4/27/00 -0500, you wrote:

> > http://www.geocities.com/orderoftheblackdagger/EQexp2/
> >
> > Halfing warriors actually had the best rate - it was like someone
> > had typoed the table.
>
>Yeah, that's just wrong. The hobbit bonuses PLUS a huge XP benefit.
>
>And I hated those hairy footed midgets before!
>
>=)
>
>--
>Frugguk, Frivyn, Fromiss: Xegony
